nodes.text: Star Wars: Republic: Honor and Duty
Honor and Duty was the twelfth story arc in Star Wars: Republic. It is set in 23 BBY.
Corruption is plaguing the Republic, and the Senate is meeting for a critical vote in an attempt to stop it.

One senator has been assassinated, and his replacement is also threatened. Obi-wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are assigned to protect him, while Senate Guards Sagoro Autem and Isaru Omin track down those seeking to kill the Senator.
Sagoro's family is falling apart, and the culprit behind the assassination attempts will surprise both the reader and Sagoro!
Hold on to your hat and seat, as events unfold that will change lives forever, and spark the Separatist Crisis!
